c74object.name: jit.gl.meshwarp
c74object.description: The jit.gl.meshwarp object deforms visual material projected on a two-dimensional mesh. It can be used for video-mapping or other creative applications.

objarg.name: drawto
objarg.digest: The named drawing context in which to draw (default = none). A named drawing context is a named instance of a jit.world, jit.pworld or jit.gl.node object. If no argument is provided the object will find a context implicitly.

method.name: jit_gl_texture
method.description: Binds the texture specified by texture-name to this object. Equivalent to setting the texture attribute to texture-name.

method.name: read
method.digest: Read the complete current state of the jit.gl.meshwarp object from a JSON file (.json).
method.description: Read the complete current state of the jit.gl.meshwarp object from a JSON file (.json). If no filename is specified, a file dialog will open to let you choose a file.

method.name: redo
method.description: Redo latest undone UI changes. Can be also called by pressing "ctrl + y/cmd + shift + z" on the keyboard.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset the jit.gl.meshwarp to the default state.
method.description: Reset the jit.gl.meshwarp to the default state. It will reset the scale, position, rotation and color attributes.

method.name: save
method.digest: Save the complete current state of the jit.gl.meshwarp object to a JSON file (.json).
method.description: Save the complete current state of the jit.gl.meshwarp object to a JSON file (.json). If no filename is specified, a file dialog will open to let you choose a file.

method.name: undo
method.description: Undo latest UI changes. Can be also called by pressing "ctrl/cmd + z" on the keyboard.

attribute.name: apply_mask
attribute.digest: Hide or show meshwarp plane using existing masks.
attribute.description: Hide or show meshwarp plane using existing masks. (default = 0)

attribute.name: curvature
attribute.digest: Set both the x and y NURBS order.
attribute.description: A quick way to set both the X and y NURBS order, which determines the curvature of the underlying canvas mesh (range 0. to 1.) Sets both dims of nurbs_order, based on the current mesh_dim. The attribute is float type, however output is clamped to int values and therefore may look choppy when adjusting.

attribute.name: enable
attribute.description: Enable flag (default = 1) When the flag is set, drawing is enabled.

attribute.name: layer
attribute.description: Object layer number (default = 0) When in automatic mode, the layer number determines the rendering order (low to high). Objects in the same layer have no guarantee which will be rendered first.

attribute.name: lock_to_aspect
attribute.digest: Lock scale to input texture ratio flag (default = 0)
attribute.description: Locks the scale to match the proportions of the input texture (default = 0). When set to active, the scale attribute will only respond to the second attribute argument (y scale).

attribute.name: mask_mode
attribute.description:
When the flag is set, masking mode is enabled.
To create a new mask: - shift + double click on meshwarp plane. To move a mask: - ctrl/cmd + drag on blue mask dot. To remove a mask: - shift + double click on blue mask dot. To modify mask: - click and drag on yellow mask dots. To create new mask vertex: - shift + double click on mask edge line. To remove mask vertex: - shift + double click on yellow mask dot.

attribute.name: meshdim
attribute.description: Dimension of the UI mesh. Sets the number of clickable vertices displayed (default = 4 4)

attribute.name: nurbs_order
attribute.digest: Set the X and Y order of the NURBS canvas mesh (default = 1 1).
attribute.description: Set the X and Y order of the underlying NURBS canvas mesh. The order determines the curvature of the canvas mesh (default = 1 1).

attribute.name: position
attribute.digest: The 3D origin in the form x y z (default = 0. 0. 0.)
attribute.description: The 3D origin in the form x y z (default = 0. 0. 0.)

attribute.name: rotatez
attribute.digest: Sets the current rotation in degrees.
attribute.description: Sets the current rotation about the positive z axes (default = 0.). Angles are expressed in degrees.

attribute.name: scale
attribute.digest: The 3D scaling factor in the form x y z (default = 1. 1. 1.)
attribute.description: The 3D scaling factor in the form x y z (default = 1. 1. 1.)

attribute.name: show_position_handle
attribute.digest: Show / Hide position handle circle flag (default = 1)
attribute.description: Show / Hide position handle circle flag (default = 1)

attribute.name: show_scale_handles
attribute.digest: Show / Hide scale handle circles flag (default = 1)
attribute.description: Show / Hide scale handle circles flag (default = 1)

attribute.name: show_ui
attribute.description: Show or hide the interactive user interface for the jit.gl.meshwarp (default = 1). When the flag is set, the object will be highlighted if not currently selected.

attribute.name: texture
attribute.digest: The name of the texture to be applied (default = none)
attribute.description: The name of the texture to be applied (default = none).

attribute.name: grid_color
attribute.digest: Set the color of the UI mesh grid (default = random);
attribute.description: Set the color of the UI mesh grid (default = random);
